description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Tomato Salad With Lemon & Crème Fraîche recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Tomato Salad With Lemon & Crème Fraîche Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 140°C. Halve and core the tomatoes and place, cut side up, on a baking sheet. Drizzle with 1 tbsp olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast about 2 hours, until very tender. Let cool.

Trim the scallions, and cut each one in half crosswise, then lengthwise. Heat the remaining oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the scallions and cook about 3 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Let cool.
Arrange 3 tomato halves and a tangle of scallions on each plate. Add a dollop of crème fraîche and drizzle with lemon oil. Serve at room temperature.
